ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | invid.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | invid.i | |- I = ( Id ` C ) |
| 3 |  | invid.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | invid.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Hom ` C ) = ( Hom ` C ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( comp ` C ) = ( comp ` C ) |
| 7 | 1, 5, 2, 3, 4 | #P_catidcl | |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) e. ( X ( Hom ` C ) X ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 4, 7 | #P_catlid | |- ( ph -> ( ( I ` X ) ( <. X , X >. ( comp ` C ) X ) ( I ` X ) ) = ( I ` X ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Sect ` C ) = ( Sect ` C ) |
| 10 | 1, 5, 6, 2, 9, 3, 4, 4, 7, 7 | #P_issect2 | |- ( ph -> ( ( I ` X ) ( X ( Sect ` C ) X ) ( I ` X ) <-> ( ( I ` X ) ( <. X , X >. ( comp ` C ) X ) ( I ` X ) ) = ( I ` X ) ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) ( X ( Sect ` C ) X ) ( I ` X ) ) |
